articles.title: Punjabi Singer Diljaan, 31, Dies in a Car Accident Near Amritsar - News18
articles.description: Punjabi singer Diljaan, who is best known for tracks Shoon Karke and Tere Warge died on Tuesday morning after he was involved in a car accident in Jandiala Guru near Amritsar.
